forePlcpMib.name: forePlcpMib
forePlcpMib.contactinfo: Postal: FORE Systems Inc. 1000 FORE Drive Warrendale, PA 15086-7502 Tel: +1 724 742 6900 Email: nm_mibs@fore.com Web: http://www.fore.com
forePlcpMib.description: This mib implements management information for the PLCP convergence layer in an atm interface. Typically PLCP framing is used to encapsulate ATM cells for transmission over a DS3/E3 link.

forePlcpConfigTable.name: forePlcpConfigTable
forePlcpConfigTable.description: A table of PLCP convergence layer information configuration parameters.

forePlcpConfigEntry.name: forePlcpConfigEntry
forePlcpConfigEntry.description: A table entry containing PLCP convergence layer configuration information for each atm interface using PLCP.

forePlcpConfigFrameFormat.name: forePlcpConfigFrameFormat
forePlcpConfigFrameFormat.description: This variable controls the PLCP framing format used to carry ATM cells over this interface. Note that some interfaces may not support all formats and that this variable may be read-only for some interfaces.

forePlcpTotalTable.name: forePlcpTotalTable
forePlcpTotalTable.description: A table of PLCP convergence layer information and parameters.

forePlcpTotalEntry.name: forePlcpTotalEntry
forePlcpTotalEntry.description: A table entry containing PLCP convergence layer information for each atm interface using PLCP.

forePlcpTotalFerrCount.name: forePlcpTotalFerrCount
forePlcpTotalFerrCount.description: The number of framing errors detected since the interface was reset. A framing error is determined by errors in the A1 and A2 bytes of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpTotalLofSeconds.name: forePlcpTotalLofSeconds
forePlcpTotalLofSeconds.description: The number of seconds an out of frame condition persisted.

forePlcpTotalBip8Count.name: forePlcpTotalBip8Count
forePlcpTotalBip8Count.description: The number of Bit Interleaved Parity errors detected since the interface was reset. A BIP error is determined by using the parity carried in the B1 byte of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpTotalFebeCount.name: forePlcpTotalFebeCount
forePlcpTotalFebeCount.description: The number of Far End BIP Errors detected. This information is determined by examination of the G1 byte in the PLCP frame.

forePlcpTotalYellowAlarmSeconds.name: forePlcpTotalYellowAlarmSeconds
forePlcpTotalYellowAlarmSeconds.description: The number of seconds that a far end yellow alarm condition has persisted. This information is determined by examiniation of the G1 byte of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpCurrentTable.name: forePlcpCurrentTable
forePlcpCurrentTable.description: A table of PLCP convergence layer information and parameters.

forePlcpCurrentEntry.name: forePlcpCurrentEntry
forePlcpCurrentEntry.description: A table entry containing PLCP convergence layer current statistics for each atm interface using PLCP.

forePlcpCurrentFerrCount.name: forePlcpCurrentFerrCount
forePlcpCurrentFerrCount.description: The number of framing errors detected in current interval. A framing error is determined by errors in the A1 and A2 bytes of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpCurrentBip8Count.name: forePlcpCurrentBip8Count
forePlcpCurrentBip8Count.description: The number of Bit Interleaved Parity errors detected in the current interval. A BIP error is determined by using the parity carried in the B1 byte of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpCurrentFebeCount.name: forePlcpCurrentFebeCount
forePlcpCurrentFebeCount.description: The number of Far End BIP Errors detected in the current interval. This information is determined by examination of the G1 byte in the PLCP frame.

forePlcpCurrentErrSeconds.name: forePlcpCurrentErrSeconds
forePlcpCurrentErrSeconds.description: Number of Errored Seconds in current interval

forePlcpCurrentSevErrSeconds.name: forePlcpCurrentSevErrSeconds
forePlcpCurrentSevErrSeconds.description: Number of Severely Errored Seconds in current interval

forePlcpCurrentUnavailSeconds.name: forePlcpCurrentUnavailSeconds
forePlcpCurrentUnavailSeconds.description: Number of Unavailable Seconds in the current interval

forePlcpIntervalTable.name: forePlcpIntervalTable
forePlcpIntervalTable.description: Interval table of PLCP convergence layer information and parameters.

forePlcpIntervalEntry.name: forePlcpIntervalEntry
forePlcpIntervalEntry.description: A table entry containing PLCP convergence layer current statistics for each atm interface using PLCP.

forePlcpIntervalFerrCount.name: forePlcpIntervalFerrCount
forePlcpIntervalFerrCount.description: The number of framing errors detected in particular interval. A framing error is determined by errors in the A1 and A2 bytes of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpIntervalBip8Count.name: forePlcpIntervalBip8Count
forePlcpIntervalBip8Count.description: The number of Bit Interleaved Parity errors detected in the particular interval. A BIP error is determined by using the parity carried in the B1 byte of the PLCP frame.

forePlcpIntervalFebeCount.name: forePlcpIntervalFebeCount
forePlcpIntervalFebeCount.description: The number of Far End BIP Errors detected in the particular interval. This information is determined by examination of the G1 byte in the PLCP frame.

forePlcpIntervalErrSeconds.name: forePlcpIntervalErrSeconds
forePlcpIntervalErrSeconds.description: Number of Errored Seconds in particular interval

forePlcpIntervalSevErrSeconds.name: forePlcpIntervalSevErrSeconds
forePlcpIntervalSevErrSeconds.description: Number of Severely Errored Seconds in particular interval

forePlcpIntervalUnavailSeconds.name: forePlcpIntervalUnavailSeconds
forePlcpIntervalUnavailSeconds.description: Number of Unavailable Seconds in the particular interval

forePlcpYellowDetected.name: forePlcpYellowDetected
forePlcpYellowDetected.description: This trap indicates that the specified DS3 port has detected incoming PLCP Yellow Alarm.

forePlcpYellowCleared.name: forePlcpYellowCleared
forePlcpYellowCleared.description: This trap indicates that the specified DS3 port has detected clearance of incoming PLCP Yellow Alarm.

forePlcpLOFDetected.name: forePlcpLOFDetected
forePlcpLOFDetected.description: This trap indicates that the specified DS3 port has detected incoming PLCP LOF Alarm.

forePlcpLOFCleared.name: forePlcpLOFCleared
forePlcpLOFCleared.description: This trap indicates that the specified DS3 port has detected clearance of incoming PLCP LOF Alarm.
